verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “Note pen theihna kicing na kisa mah uh a, pilna a nei na kisa mah uh hi.
verses.3: Ahi zongin note zah mahin kei zong thu ka thei a, midangte sangin na theih zawk uh bang om tuan ahi hiam?
verses.4: Ka lawmte nangawn in tu-in kei hong nuihsan uh a, kei dikin paubaang lo napi hong nuihsan uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in ka thungetna a hong piak hun om hi.
verses.5: Note in lungkhamna bangmah na nei kei uh a, kei na hong ciamnuih bawl gawpgawp uh hi. A puk dektak mipa na sat gawp uh hi.
verses.6: Guta mite nuam takin om hithiat uh a, Pasian a simmawhte nuam takin nungta uh hi.
verses.7: “Ahi zongin gamsate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Vasate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi.
verses.8: Leitung ganhingte va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi. Tui sung ngasate zong va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi.
verses.9: Pasianʼ khut in amaute a bawlna thu a vekpi-un thei kim uh hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.10: A piansak sateʼ nuntakna Pasian mah in a uk ahi hi. Mihing khempeuhteʼ nuntakna ama khut sungah om hi.
verses.11: Leii in an a ciap mah bangin, bil in ngai thei hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.12: “Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu thei tel uh hi.
verses.13: Pasian in pilna le vang nei a, amah thukipin thu a thei tel hi.
verses.14: Pasian in phelkek leh kuamah in lamkik zo lo a, Pasian in thong ah mi koih leh kuamah in suaktasak zo lo hi.
verses.15: Pasian in guah khaktan leh leitung keugaw a, tui a khah ciangin tui hong khang hi.
verses.16: “Pasian thahatin gualzo tawntung a, mi khemte le khemna a thuakte Pasianʼ ukna nuai ah a om uh ahi hi.
verses.17: Amah in mipilteʼ pilna susia-in, makaite pen mihai bangin gamtasak hi.
verses.18: Amah in kumpite zakiasak a, thong ah a khia hi.
verses.19: Siampite mihai suaksak a, mi vangliante lawnthal hi.
verses.20: Amah in miʼ muante a pau thei loin bawl a, khanghamteʼ pilna a paih khiatsak hi.
verses.21: Amah in mi vangliante mindaisak a, mi thupiteʼ kihihsakna a beisak hi.
verses.22: Amah in khuamial sung panin thuthukte kal khia a, a kithei zo lo thute kitelsak hi.
verses.23: Amah in minamte thahatsakin liansak a, ahi zongin amah in tuate zo gawpin susia hi.
verses.24: Amah in minam makaite a pilna uh paih khiatsak a, lampi om lohna gamlak ah vakvaisak hi.
verses.25: Khuamial lakah amaute in mialzawt uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoihoi uh hi.
